actions.description: The skull lord makes three Bone Staff or Deathly Ray attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage plus 21 (6d6) necrotic damage.
actions.name: Bone Staff

actions.description: 10 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. Hit: 27 (5d8 + 5) necrotic damage.
actions.name: Deathly Ray

actions.description:
The skull, lord casts one of the following spells, using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 18):
At will: mage hand, message

2/day each: dimension door, fear

1/day each: cloudkill, cone of cold
actions.name: Spellcasting

actions.description: The skull lord makes one Bone Staff or Deathly Ray attack.
actions.name: Attack

actions.description: The skull lord moves up to its speed without provoking opportunity attack.
actions.name: Move

actions.description: The skull lord summons up to five skeletons or zombie||zombies in unoccupied spaces within 30 feet of it. They remain until destroyed. Undead summoned in this way roll initiative, act in the next available turn, and obey the skull lord. The skull lord can have no more than five Undead summoned by this ability at a time.
actions.name: Summon Undead (Costs 2 Actions)

conditionImmunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, poisoned, stunned, unconscious
languages: all the languages it knew in life
name: Skull Lord [MoM]
resistances: cold, necrotic; bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

specialTraits.description: If the skull lord is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half the damage, the skull lord instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw and only half damage if it fails, provided it isn't incapacitated.
specialTraits.name: Evasion

specialTraits.description: If the skull lord fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.
specialTraits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)

specialTraits.description: While within 30 feet of the skull lord, any Undead ally of the skull lord makes saving throws with advantage, and that ally regains 1d6 hit points whenever it starts its turn there.
specialTraits.name: Master of the Grave

specialTraits.description: The skull lord doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.
specialTraits.name: Unusual Nature
